4.11.1.description:
For organizations disclosing
to climate change, forests or
water security, disclosure,
awareness and management
scoring have been corrected
to account for companies
whose engagement in
activities that could directly
influence policy, law, or
regulation differs between
environmental issues.
4.11.1.changes_to_scoring:
Disclosure, awareness and management scoring has been
updated to remove scoring specific to the environmental
issue. The scoring of 4.11.1 will now be integrated for
climate change, forests and water.
Climate change/ Forests/ Water Disclosure scoring:
Updated from:
ROUTE A)
For rows where 'Climate change'/’Water’/’Forests is
selected in column 'Environmental issues the policy, law, or
regulation relates to':
Points will be awarded per completed cell in proportion to
the number of rows disclosed. Partially completed rows will
not receive full points.
A maximum of 8/8 points is available for this route.
OR
NOT APPLICABLE ROUTE)
'Climate change'/’Water’/’Forest’ NOT selected in column
'Environmental issues the policy, law, or regulation relates
to’ in any row – 0/0 points
4.11.1.updated_from:
ROUTE A)
For rows where 'Climate change'/’Water’/’Forests is
selected in column 'Environmental issues the policy, law, or
regulation relates to':
Points will be awarded per completed cell in proportion to
the number of rows disclosed. Partially completed rows will
not receive full points.
A maximum of 8/8 points is available for this route.
OR
NOT APPLICABLE ROUTE)
'Climate change'/’Water’/’Forest’ NOT selected in column
'Environmental issues the policy, law, or regulation relates
to’ in any row – 0/0 points

4.11.2.description:
For organizations disclosing
to climate change, forests or
water, disclosure, awareness
and management scoring
have been corrected to
account for companies
whose engagement in
activities that could directly
influence policy, law, or
regulation differs between
environmental issues.
4.11.2.changes_to_scoring:
Disclosure, awareness and management scoring criteria
have been updated to remove scoring specific to the
environmental issue. The scoring of 4.11.2 will now be
integrated for climate change, forests and water.
Climate change/ Forests/ Water Disclosure scoring:
Updated from:
ROUTE A)
For rows where ‘Climate change’/‘Forest’/'Water' is selected
in column 'Environmental issues relevant to the policies,
laws, or regulations on which the organization or individual
has taken a position':
Points will be awarded per completed cell in proportion to
the number of rows disclosed. Partially completed rows will
not receive full points.
A maximum of 10/10 points is available for this route.
OR
4.11.2.updated_from:
ROUTE A)
For rows where ‘Climate change’/‘Forest’/'Water' is selected
in column 'Environmental issues relevant to the policies,
laws, or regulations on which the organization or individual
has taken a position':
Points will be awarded per completed cell in proportion to
the number of rows disclosed. Partially completed rows will
not receive full points.
A maximum of 10/10 points is available for this route.
OR

5.1.1.description:
For organizations disclosing
on climate change, the point
allocations for leadership
level criteria i) and ii) have
been corrected for all
sectors excluding financial
services organizations.
5.1.1.changes_to_scoring:
Point allocations at leadership level for route A corrected
from 1 point to 1.5 points for both criteria i) and ii).
Overall, the total points available for this route remains 4
points.
This change has been made for all sectors excluding
financial services, in the climate change scoring
methodology.

5.4.1.description:
Guidance around the
appearance of column 4
“Indicate whether you are
reporting eligibility
information for the selected
objective”

5.11.description:
For organizations disclosing
on forests, awareness
scoring for all sectors
excluding financial services
has been corrected.
5.11.changes_to_scoring:
Criteria updated to only cross check the four scored
commodity rows of timber products, palm oil, cattle
products and soy (as applicable) in question 1.22.
Updated from:
ROUTE A)
'Produced' NOT selected in column 'Produced and/or
sourced' in all rows in question 1.22. (Please note: This
route applies if 'Sourced' OR 'Produced and sourced' is
selected for any commodity, or if column 'Produced and/or
sourced' is not completed for any commodity.)
....
ROUTE B)
'Produced' selected in column 'Produced and/or sourced' in
all rows in question 1.22.
5.11.updated_from:
ROUTE A)
'Produced' NOT selected in column 'Produced and/or
sourced' in all rows in question 1.22. (Please note: This
route applies if 'Sourced' OR 'Produced and sourced' is
selected for any commodity, or if column 'Produced and/or
sourced' is not completed for any commodity.)
....
ROUTE B)
'Produced' selected in column 'Produced and/or sourced' in
all rows in question 1.22.

For organizations disclosing
on climate change, question
7.30.2 is no longer scored at
management or leadership

For organizations disclosing

and steel, awareness level
7.30.14.changes_to_scoring:

7.49.description:
For steel sector
organizations disclosing on
climate change, the figure in
route A has been corrected
at the leadership level.
7.49.changes_to_scoring:
Figure requirement for column 'Emissions intensity figure,
metric tons CO2e per metric ton of crude steel production’
updated from ‘less than 1’ to ‘less than 1.328’ at the
Leadership level for steel sector.

7.53.2.description:
For organizations
responding to climate
change, column ‘Target
coverage’ has been excluded
from disclosure level scoring
for all sectors. The inability
to add text to the ‘Other,
please specify’ drop-down
option in this column will not
be penalised.
7.53.2.changes_to_scoring:
Updated from:
Points will be awarded per completed cell in proportion to
the number of rows disclosed excluding the following
columns:
- 'Intensity figure in base year for total Scope 3'
- 'Intensity figure in base year for all selected Scopes'
- Intensity figure in reporting year for total Scope 3'
- Intensity figure in reporting year for all selected Scopes'
- 'Intensity figure at end date of target for all selected
Scopes'
- '% of target achieved relative to base year'
Partially completed rows will not receive full points.
A maximum of 14/14 points is available for this question.
Updated to:
Points will be awarded per completed cell in proportion to
the number of rows disclosed excluding the following
columns:
- 'Intensity figure in base year for total Scope 3'
7.53.2.updated_from:
Points will be awarded per completed cell in proportion to
the number of rows disclosed excluding the following
columns:
- 'Intensity figure in base year for total Scope 3'
- 'Intensity figure in base year for all selected Scopes'
- Intensity figure in reporting year for total Scope 3'
- Intensity figure in reporting year for all selected Scopes'
- 'Intensity figure at end date of target for all selected
Scopes'
- '% of target achieved relative to base year'
Partially completed rows will not receive full points.
A maximum of 14/14 points is available for this question.
7.53.2.updated_to:
Points will be awarded per completed cell in proportion to
the number of rows disclosed excluding the following
columns:
- 'Intensity figure in base year for total Scope 3'

7.53.4.description:
For financial services
organizations disclosing on
climate change, criteria iii) at
awareness level has been
updated to clarify that
organizations achieving
100% of their targets receive
full credit.
7.53.4.changes_to_scoring:
Updated from:
iii) Figure greater than 0 provided in column '% of target
achieved relative to base year' OR 'New' selected in column
'Target status in reporting year' AND date provided in
column 'Date target was set' is the same as date provided
in column 'End date' in question 1.4 - 2 points
Updated to:

achieved relative to base year' OR 'New' selected in column
'Target status in reporting year' AND date provided in
column 'Date target was set' is the same as date provided
in column 'End date' in question 1.4

7.54.1.description:
For organizations
responding to climate
change, column ‘Target
coverage’ has been excluded
from disclosure and
awareness level scoring for
all sectors. The inability to
add text to the ‘Other, please
specify’ drop-down option in
this column will not be
penalised.
In addition, awareness
criteria and management
level criteria ii have been
updated to clarify that
organizations achieving
100% of their targets receive
full credit.

7.55.1.description:
For all sectors disclosing on
climate change, criteria i at
disclosure level has been
clarified.

8.1.description:
For all organizations
disclosing to forests. The
Chinese translation of the
“No” option in column
“Exclusion from disclosure”
was incorrect. This issue
was fixed on 17 July 2025,
and affected Chinese
translations only.

8.7.2.description:
For all organizations
disclosing to forests,
clarification to management
and leadership criteria to
clarify that organizations
achieving 100% of their
targets receive full credit.
8.7.2.changes_to_scoring:
Management criteria:
Updated from:
All of the following met - 1 point
Any of the following selected in column 'Target status in
reporting year'
- 'New'
- 'Underway'
- 'Achieved'
- 'Revised'
AND
Date provided in column ‘End date of target’ is before or the
same as 31st December 2025
8.7.2.updated_from:
All of the following met - 1 point
Any of the following selected in column 'Target status in
reporting year'
- 'New'
- 'Underway'
- 'Achieved'
- 'Revised'
AND
Date provided in column ‘End date of target’ is before or the
same as 31st December 2025

12.6.1.changes_to_scoring:
Climate change Management criteria for financial services:
Updated from:
At least one row disclosed where a corresponding option is
selected in column 'Portfolio' for each row where 'Yes'
selected in column 'Activity undertaken' in question 1.10
AND
Any option selected excluding 'Internally classified' in
column 'Taxonomy or methodology used to identify product
characteristics' (excluding rows where 'Insurance
underwriting (Insurance company)' is selected in column
'Portfolio') - 2 points
Updated to:
At least one row disclosed where a corresponding option is
selected in column 'Portfolio' for each row where 'Yes'
selected in column 'Activity undertaken' in question 1.10
AND
Any option selected excluding 'Internally classified' in
column 'Taxonomy or methodology used to identify product
characteristics' (excluding rows where 'Insurance
underwriting (Insurance company)' or 'Investing (Asset
owner)' is selected in column 'Portfolio') - 2 points
